insightsPage.notEnoughBody: Keep journaling to unlock your personal insights! After a few entries, this page will fill up with beautiful charts and trends about your mental wellness journey.
insightsPage.moodCalendarDesc: Each square reflects your average mood score for that day (scale 1–10). Darker intensity = higher average. Missing days mean no entries.
insightsPage.selfAffirmationsDesc: These are uplifting sentences extracted from your own positive entries (score ≥ 8). Revisit them for encouragement.
insightsPage.positiveWordCloudDesc: Words you use often that reflect growth or resilience.
insightsPage.adaptiveInsightsDesc: Generated from patterns across time, days, and your mood shifts. They evolve as you write more.
